name: FURIOUS PRESTIDIGITATION
description:
A fellow wizard has challenged you to a duel of the wits! This is your chance to prove that your mastery of trivial magic tricks is the best in the land! Move your conjurations FURIOUSLY across the tabletop to destroy the enemy rune and claim your victory.

Submission for the one-button game jam. The menus, card selection, and gameplay all use input in the form of tapping and holding any button on the keyboard, mouse, or gamepad. Selecting a card in your hand is done by tapping at the correct time.

Reuploaded to include the audio library installer.
